front.title: Implementation Recommendations to Improve the Scalability of RSVP-TE Deployments

abstract.t: The scale at which RSVP-TE Label Switched Paths (LSPs) get deployed is growing continually and the onus is on RSVP-TE implementations across the board to keep up with this increasing demand. This document introduces a couple of techniques - "Refresh-Interval Independent RSVP (RI-RSVP)" and "Per-Peer Flow-Control" - to help RSVP-TE deployments push the envelope on scaling.
